xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

Class OneRecordPerPageStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.AbstractStrategy
      • xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.OneRecordPerPageStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Strategy, Convertable

    public class OneRecordPerPageStrategy
extends AbstractStrategy
    This class provides one record per page strategy. Each record gets its own page. This strategy usually performs bad.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
